data.description: September 8, 2021: Amazon Elasticsearch Service has been renamed to Amazon OpenSearch Service. See details. data.tags: Amazon DocumentDB, Amazon SageMaker, Artificial Intelligence

data.title: Amazon Forecast now supports accuracy measurements for individual items
data.authors: Namita Das, Christy Bergman, Punit Jain
data.description: We’re excited to announce that you can now measure the accuracy of forecasts for individual items in Amazon Forecast, allowing you to better understand your forecasting model’s performance for the items that most impact your business. Improving forecast accuracy for specific items—such as those with higher prices or higher costs—is often more important than optimizing […]

data.title: Amazon Lex launches support for Latin American Spanish and German
data.description: ¡Amazon Lex lanza soporte para español para América Latina! Amazon Lex startet auf Deutsch! Amazon Lex is a service for building conversational interfaces into any application using voice and text. Starting today, Amazon Lex supports Latin American Spanish and German. Now you can easily create virtual agents, conversational IVR systems, self-service chatbots, or application bots […]

data.title: Customizing your machine translation using Amazon Translate Active Custom Translation

data.title: Amazon Augmented AI is now a HIPAA eligible service
data.description: Amazon Augmented AI (Amazon A2I) is now a HIPAA eligible service. Amazon A2I makes it easy to build the workflows required for human review of machine learning (ML) predictions. data.title: Predicting qualification ranking based on practice session performance for Formula 1 Grand Prix
data.tags: Amazon ML Solutions Lab, Amazon SageMaker, Artificial Intelligence, Sports
data.description: If you’re a Formula 1 (F1) fan, have you ever wondered why F1 teams have very different performances between qualifying and practice sessions? data.title: Meet Olivia: The first NTTS voice in Australian English for Amazon Polly
